com.emman.tame.dialogs.SMPPreference.android:title: Core Plug Management
com.emman.tame.dialogs.SMPPreference.android:summary: Enable/Disable secondary cores based off cpu load.

com.emman.tame.dialogs.CPUBoostPreferenc.android:title: Input Boost
com.emman.tame.dialogs.CPUBoostPreferenc.android:summary: Raise CPU minimum speed during input events.

ListPreference.android:title: Multi-Core Power Saving
ListPreference.android:summary: Group more processes onto primary core.

ListPreference.android:title: Celox Display Undervoltage
ListPreference.android:summary: Undervolting the screen saves battery. Colors may appear different, but this feature is safe to use.
